# defaultSource

**Instance Property**

Returns the  joint transforms representing the default source value.

## Declaration

```swift
var defaultSource: JointTransforms? { get }
```

## Discussion

See  [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationStateProtocol/defaultSource] for  more about the default source value.
